title: "Digitization: The Most Popular Strategy Pursued By Financial Institutions"
excerpt: "Digitization has quickly become one of the top strategies pursued by financial institutions to improve core processing competencies, gain deeper business insights, and enhance customer services. The digitization of lending services is particularly beneficial to lenders and borrowers in the form of convenient loan applications and disbursement processes."
